title: Vegetarian apple, cranberry and raisin stuffing
ingredients: ['1 (450g) loaf white bloomer, cut into 2.5cm cubes', '450g wholeberry cranberry sauce', '3 Granny Smith apples, cored and sliced', '165g sultanas', '1 tablespoon grated lemon zest', '2 teaspoons grated orange zest', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 eggs', '120ml cold pressed cloudy apple juice', '115g melted butter']
